title: "A Guide to Enjoying Irish" hand printed script
author: Kate Basart

comments.content:
I would say this isn't a font at all, mainly because none of the tails on the g, j, or y are close to identical. Usually there would be some kind of uniformity.

However, it could be something that someone manipulated from a basic face like sand. I yield to the experts on this site.
I would disagree, as the "n", "o", "g" & "i" are identical to each other. I don't know which font it is, however.
i'm pretty sure it's a font because i have instances where the g's repeat, and they are identical (and the y's, etc.)
